name: hcmail-in-raycast
title: HackClub Mail In Raycast
description: HCmail in RayCast is a RayCast extension that allows you to search though your HackClub mails. It displays current status of your mail, and helps you manage your mails.
author: samliu

commands.name: mail
commands.title: My mail
commands.description: Get the incoming HackClub mails, status of mails, and some other info.

commands.name: setkey
commands.title: Set Api Key
commands.description: Set up  HackClub Mail api key, to allow interaction with HackClub mail.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
